resources.string: Below is a basic recycler view that is displaying a list of items. Select any of the below items to see more on what a recycler view can do.
Default Horizontal Recycler View\nBelow is a horizontal oriented recycler view that scrolls to the right.
Reversed Horizontal Recycler View\nThe reversed horizontal recycler view scrolls to the left.

Endless Circular Horizontal Recycler View
This endless circular recycler view can be scrolled "endlessly". However, we are able to see the endless effect because we are using a large number as the view holder's position.

Here is an explanation that might help you understand, imagine your first item is at position (231 - 1 divide 2 = 1073741823) and you have scroll through 1073741823 times to reach 0th or (231 - 10) th position. This is how a recycler view achieves the endless effect.
Endless Horizontal Recycler View (Right)\nEndless scrolling to the right .
Endless Horizontal Recycler View (Left)\nEndless scrolling to the left.
